channel.title: Photo Blog
channel.description: Barber is a blog theme for Jekyll built by Thomas Vaeth for Samesies using HTML, Sass, and JavaScript.

item.title: South Congress
item.description:
Today I visited South Congress here in Austin, TX with my Bower 35/1.4 and Nikon D800 in hand. It’s always interesting to see the changes over time to this iconic location; in my mind I still imagine it as the way it was when I first visited.

This is the flagship Torchy’s restaurant, now serving takeout only like most restaurants in the post-covid age.
